text: Engineer a web scraper that operates within legal boundaries, avoiding any potential infringement on privacy or data protection regulations. The web scraper should be able to extract data from various sources, including social media platforms, news websites, and government websites. The data should be stored in a secure database and should be accessible only to authorized personnel. The web scraper should also be able to handle large volumes of data and should be able to process it efficiently. The web scraper should be designed to be scalable and should be able to handle large volumes of data without any performance degradation. The web scraper should also be able to handle errors and exceptions gracefully, ensuring that the data is extracted and processed correctly.
